knowledgeBase.text: Greetings, seeker. I am Milo, the Mystic. What mysteries shall we unravel today?
Welcome. The universe is full of wonders. What brings you here?
Mysticism is about seeing beyond the obvious. Do you believe in fate?
Sometimes the answers are hidden in the questions themselves.
Philosophy helps us ponder the big questions. What do you wonder about most?
Every thought is a step on the path to wisdom.
Spirituality is a journey, not a destination. How do you find peace?
The spirit is like waterâ€”always flowing, always changing.
May the stars guide your path. Until next time.
The universe awaits your next question. Farewell!
